section.title: A Happy Ending
section.p: In the end, Belle saves the beast--not only from Gaston, but also from the curse. In a moment of intense emotion and passion, Belle kisses the beast, breaking the curse and releasing the prince that was trapped inside all those years, transforming the monstrous beast into a young, handsome man. Not only does she free him, but she also frees everyone else that was put under the curse. Everybody is back to their own selves, and they all live happily ever after, with the prince and Belle finding the truest form of love life can offer.
